articles.author: Sarah Collins
articles.title: Europe unveils plans for a unified corporate tax regime - Independent.ie
articles.description: THE EU is readying a new corporate tax rulebook that will target multinationals where they base their sales, assets and workforce.
articles.content:
THE EU is readying a new corporate tax rulebook that will target multinationals where they base their sales, assets and workforce.
The rules - which will be mandatory for EU members - will be tabled… [+2450 chars]

articles.title: Welsh Kiwi Hadleigh Parkes has 'no regrets' as Japan clash with Beauden Barrett awaits - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The Panasonic midfielder's career only took off when he left NZ but he now views European Cup club rugby as a better experience than Super Rugby.
articles.content:
Former Blues and Hurricanes midfielder Hadleigh Parkes may not be the highest-profile New Zealand rugby export but there are few players who have prospered so much after leaving these shores.

articles.title: `Rich countries can donate more jabs’ – The Manila Times - The Manila Times
articles.description: Countries belonging to the G7 and the European Union can afford to donate more than 150 million vaccines to countries in need without compromising their own goals, United Nations Children’s Emergency Fund (Unicef) said Monday. The world’s seven richest states…
